knimeNode.name: DFM Miner
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is created for discovering Directly-Follows graph from an event log.

fullDescription.intro: This node is created for discovering Directly-Follows Model as a graph. It accepts an event log as input and generates DirectlyFollowsModel as output. In this package without note, Directly-Follows Model is abbreviated as DFM. A DFM is composed of activities in rectangle, which are connected with arcs for directly-follows relation. The green rectangles represent the start activities, while the red ones for the end activities.
fullDescription.option: The classifier chosen to classify the event log.
The variant type used to extract one directly-follows graph from event log. There are three options.
